case_name: State ex rel. Cox v. Downing
case_name_full: STATE ex rel James E. COX v. Hon. Bob DOWNING, Judge Nineteenth Judicial District Court

opinions.opinion_text:
In re Cox, James E.; — Plaintiff(s); applying for supervisory and/or remedial writs; Parish of East Baton Rouge, 19th Judicial District Court, Div. “A”, No. 6-81-924.
Denied. Moot. Relator has been resen-tenced to 17 years at hard labor for manslaughter and the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, has vacated the additional penalty of two years at hard labor without benefit of parole imposed under La.R.S. 14:95.2.
